name: tm25
effect: Teaches Thunder to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thunder to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Strikes the foe
with a thunderbolt.
It may paralyze.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Strikes the foe
with a thunderbolt.
It may paralyze.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A brutal lightning
attack that may
also leave the foe
paralyzed.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the
foe to inflict damage. It may also
leave the target paralyzed.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the
foe to inflict damage. It may also
leave the target paralyzed.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the
foe to inflict damage. It may also
leave the target paralyzed.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped
on the target to inflict damage. It may
also leave the target with paralysis.

A wicked thunderbolt is dropped
on the target to inflict damage. It may
also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on
the target to inflict damage. This may

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to

flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user charges at the target and may make
it flinch.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
This move enables the user to protect itself from
all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used
in succession.
